org.apache.mahout.classifier.df.mapreduce

Class Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mahout.classifier.df.mapreduce.Builder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InMemBuilder, PartialBuilder

    public abstract class Builder
extends Object
    Base class for Mapred DecisionForest builders. Takes care of storing the parameters common to the mapred implementations.
    The child classes must implement at least :
    • void configureJob(Job) : to further configure the job before its launch; and
    • DecisionForest parseOutput(Job, PredictionCallback) : in order to convert the job outputs into a DecisionForest and its corresponding oob predictions
